div.p: Monthly Index of Medical Specialties (MIMS) standard code set

The intended use of Monthly Index of Medical Specialties (MIMS) Data is to fully specify the product as a combination of product code, form code, and pack code. For example, when providing a MIMS Code within a Clinical Document Architecture (CDA) document, the MIMS code will be a minimum of 5 digits (in most cases, will be 8 digits).

description.value: HL7 AU representation of the Monthly Index of Medical Specialties (MIMS) code system developed by MIMS Australia Pty Ltd. This is not the canonical publication nor it is intended to be publication on behalf of MIMS Australia Pty Ltd.”/>
